byline.original: By LARRY ROHTER; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

abstract: Leading writers from China and India will meet at Asia Society in November for The 'Chindia' Dialogues, series of panel discussions focusing on cultural and social trends in both countries as well as their interactions with each other.
snippet: Leading writers from China and India will meet for panel discussions in New York early next month as part of a new initiative called “The ‘Chindia’ Dialogues.”
lead_paragraph: Leading writers from China and India will meet for panel discussions in New York early next month as part of a new initiative called “The ‘Chindia’ Dialogues.”
